label: PublicTrail of Finance Minister Itzhak Mudai took place at Kiryat Menahem a suburb of Jerusalem for his ignorance of the weak population with the presence of Knesset Members Victor Shem Tov of Mapam and Ran Cohen of Ratz Party.
